name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault
display_help: Fiery Assault allows you to conjure up flaming melee attacks and hurl devastating fiery projectiles. Fiery Assault powers tend to set foes ablaze for added Damage Over Time.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Flares
powers.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 15.31 fire damage on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Incinerate
powers.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent at melee range. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 10 ticks of 12.38 fire damage over 4.6s on target
10 ticks of 16.10 fire damage over 4.6s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Fire_Breath
powers.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 3 ticks of 30.91 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 49.80 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Fire_Blast
powers.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 7.92 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Fiery_Embrace
powers.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Long

display_info: 85.00% strength to fire damage for 30s on self
68.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Combustion
powers.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: 8 ticks of 5.84 fire damage over 7.1s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Consume
powers.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long

display_info: 5.00% recovery rate for 15s on self after 0.25s delay
50.00% resistance to endurance debuff for 2m 0s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Blazing_Bolt
powers.display_help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Fiery_Assault.Blaze
powers.display_help: A devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 5 ticks of 80.00% chance for 11.89 fire damage over 4.1s on target after 0.5s delay
